devdoc.author: Tommaso Azzalin

addTodoItem(string).details: Adds the To-Do item to the list of items of the account.

params.todoDescription: the action to perform and that we want to control its status.

returns._0: the unique identifier of the To-Do item.

getTodoItems().details: Returns the list of To-Do items of the sender account.

returns._0: the To-Do items of the account.

updateTodoItemState(uint256,uint8).details: Adds the To-Do item to the list of items of the account.

params.newState: the new completition state (can only be larger than the current one.
params.todoItemId: the unique identifier returned by the contract function `addTodoItem(todoDescription)`.

returns._0: `true` if the status was updated, `false` otherwise.

devdoc.title: Smart Contract for storing To-Do lists.
